metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7946 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
X.org libXi before 1.7.7 allows remote X servers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via vectors involving length fields.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7946` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxi6 - 2:1.7.8-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> same commit as CVE-2016-7945 mdeslaur> possible regression: https://bugs.freedesktop.org/show_bug.cgi?id=98204

criterions.comment: libxi package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.7.8-1').
